lines.text: Gah! This guy's, uh... he's dead, alright. This the victim?
This is that Go Wizard, right? I didn’t take a really close look, before...
He’s our victim, right?
Most likely. He’s the guy who owns the room, anyway.
So he’s the guy responsible for this place bein’ a huge dump, huh?
We got a name on this guy?
Uh, no.
Huh? How do we not have a name?
Well, I took a look at the lease. Seems the man signed his name as ‘’none of your business’’.
’’None of your business?’’
Yep. ‘’None of your business’’, and then a little angry face.
...Man, that ain’t subtle. You’d think he’d at least come up with a plausible fake name, yeah?
Anyway… dang. He’s got a bullet wound in him, and there’s blood all over the floor.
Seems kinda… open and shut.
His robes are kinda burnt, but it looks like most of him was untouched. I think the bullet’s what did him in.
And... huh. He's holding a candle? It's not lit, but it used to be, judging by the wick.
Oh, that's a candle? Whew. Was kinda worried that was a stick of dynamite...
Why would he have dynamite on him?
Anyway... he's got some kind of weird tattoos on his face. Maybe that's relevant, somehow?
Anyway... hey! He's got those tattoos from the book!
We can use those to figure out <c=#FF00FF>what kind of wizard</c> he is.
That’s about the size of it. What’s got us worried is that we don’t know what happened to the other guy.
That charred thing near the door?
Yep. Beardy here is no mystery.
This guy looks super dead, from gun-related problems.
I’m thinking he’s a wizard, but we still need to nail down <c=#FF00FF>what kind.</c>
It’s the dead Go Wizard. Looks like he got shot right in the chest.
